item.title: Use FREE and Open-Source Software to Organise Your Life Efficiently
item.description: There are many productive software and tools to boost your “GTD” and make your informative life organised, while after years of struggling and practice, here’s a list of “MUST TRY”. Keep using it and fit it in your life, then you will be like a “BOSS”. Github Use it as your blog and code base like this website. Google G-suit Online docs and sheets are much more easiler and free to collaborate one another and open-to-use.
